mapper.insert: insert into notice (title, content, writeday) values (#{title}, #{content}, now())
mapper.select: select * from notice where title like concat('%',#{param1},'%') order by id desc limit #{param2},10
select ceil(count(*)/10) from notice where title like concat('%',#{param1},'%')
mapper.update: update notice set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, writeday = now() where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into news (category, rank, thumbnail, title, content, writeday) values(#{category},#{rank},#{thumbnail},#{title},#{content},now())
mapper.select: select * from news where rank = 0 and title like concat('%',#{param1},'%') order by id desc limit #{param2},5
select * from news where rank = 1 and title like concat('%',#{param1},'%') order by id desc
mapper.update: update news set category = #{category}, rank = #{rank}, thumbnail = #{thumbnail}, title = #{title}, content = #{content}, writeday = now() where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select ceil(count(*)/5) from news where title like concat('%',#{param1},'%')
mapper.insert: insert into campaign (category, thumbnail, title, content, startdate, enddate, writeday) values(#{category},#{thumbnail},#{title},#{content},#{startdate},#{enddate},now())
mapper.select: select * from campaign where now() >= startdate and now() <= enddate and title like concat('%',#{param1},'%') order by id desc
select count(*) from campaign where now() >= startdate and now() <= enddate and title like concat('%',#{param1},'%')
mapper.update: update campaign set category = #{category}, thumbnail = #{thumbnail}, title = #{title}, content = #{content}, startdate = #{startdate}, enddate = #{enddate}, writeday = now() where id = #{id}
